description: Gets user attributes and and MFA settings for the currently signed-in user. Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: A valid access token that Amazon Cognito issued to the currently signed-in user. Must include a scope claim for aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The name of the user that you requested.

nested_items.name: UserAttributes
nested_items.description: An array of name-value pairs representing user attributes.

nested_items.name: MFAOptions
nested_items.description: This response parameter is no longer supported. It provides information only about SMS MFA configurations. It doesn't provide information about time-based one-time password (TOTP) software token MFA configurations. To look up information about either type of MFA configuration, use UserMFASettingList instead.

nested_items.name: DeliveryMedium
nested_items.description: The delivery medium to send the MFA code. You can use this parameter to set only the SMS delivery medium value.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The attribute name of the MFA option type. The only valid value is phone_number.

nested_items.name: PreferredMfaSetting
nested_items.description: The user's preferred MFA. Users can prefer SMS message, email message, or TOTP MFA.

nested_items.name: UserMFASettingList
nested_items.description: The MFA options that are activated for the user. The possible values in this list are SMS_MFA, EMAIL_OTP, and SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA.
